summary: An publisher insinuates himself into the mouldering mansion of the centenarian lover of a renowned but long-dead poet in order to find his lost love letters.
cast: Robert Cummings|Susan Hayward|Agnes Moorehead|Joan Lorring|Eduardo Ciannelli|John Archer|Frank Puglia|Minerva Urecal|William Edmunds|Eugene Borden|Gino Corrado|Peter Cusanelli|Christian Drake|Martin Garralaga|Micholas Khadarik|Saverio LoMedico|Donna Martell|Lillian Molieri|Julian Rivero|Wallace Stark|Robert Verdaine
title: Viviendo el pasado
